column4: Would someone please take a look at the Desktop context section of my rc.xml for Openbox? http://pastebin.com/ZBsXxtYn  I can't get the mouse binding to work with the VolumeNotify.sh script at the bottom.  :(
Does it work if you toss it in quotes?
I have checked it out in the terminal, and yep, it's executable and fully functional.
lol Yeah, I was thinking it was just me...
I've also tried it with C and A instead of W.  No luck.
Does it work if you substitute the command for like, firefox or whatever?
I'm curious if it's the command, or the keybind.
aha, no that mousebind doesn't work either.
Then it's the mousebind not the exec :)
well, how is my syntax any different from the default command to move to the previous desktop?
I have no idea. :S I don't use openbox.
ah, okay.  :)  Well, thanks for helping.  I guess there's something about the Execute action...
